title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

title: The Murder Room
author: P.D. James

quote_last: when I pulled up in front of the library. Still early for our date, so I got out of the car and took a stroll down the misty streets. In a coffee shop, watched a golf match on television, then I went to an entertainment center and played a video game. The object of the game was to wipe out tanks invading from across the river. I was winning at first, but as the game went on, the enemy tanks bred like lemmings, crushing me by sheer number and destroying my base. An on-screen nuclear blast took care of everything, followed by the message game over insert coin.
title: Hard-Boiled Wonderland and the End of the World
author: Haruki Murakami

title: A Man Lay Dead
